name: Doggo (D4rkWeasel)
description:
Doggo is a game created for the "Compo" of [Ludum Dare 46](https://ldjam.com). The theme this time was "Keep it alive". Everything here (including music, sounds and assets) was created by me in 48 hours.

Doggo is a good boy and loves to protect sheep.
  - Protect the sheep!
  - Bark at the wolves to scare them away!
  - Have fun!
